content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":47231,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あんなに威勢良く啖呵を切ったんだから」","translatedEnglishLine":"You were so spiritedly defiant just now."},{"lineNumber":47232,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おお、任せろ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Oh, leave it to me."},{"lineNumber":47233,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あんな外道、俺様が叩っ斬ってくれるわ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'll slash down such a villain myself!"},{"lineNumber":47234,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うひょひょ、そうそう。","translatedEnglishLine":"Uhihyo, yes exactly."},{"lineNumber":47235,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ずばーっと残虐返しで寸刻みじゃい」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'll swiftly and cruelly cut him to pieces."},{"lineNumber":47236,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おお……メディウサを倒せる……のか」","translatedEnglishLine":"Oh… you can defeat Medusa…?"},{"lineNumber":47237,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それなら、まだ、光明は……」","translatedEnglishLine":"If that's so, then there is still hope…"},{"lineNumber":47238,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":47239,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　＜ぴんぽんぱんぽーん＞","translatedEnglishLine":"<Ding dong, ding dong>"},{"lineNumber":47240,"originalJapaneseLine":"「う、っぐ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Ugh…!"},{"lineNumber":47241,"originalJapaneseLine":"『はーぁーーい。ちょっと待たせちゃったかしら。","translatedEnglishLine":"'Heeey. Did I keep you waiting a bit?"},{"lineNumber":47242,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今日もお姉さんのヒミツの時間、始まりよー』","translatedEnglishLine":"Today's big sister's secret time is starting again~'"},{"lineNumber":47243,"originalJapaneseLine":"ほのかに前向きになろうとした空気に","translatedEnglishLine":"Amid an atmosphere that was starting to turn faintly hopeful,"},{"lineNumber":47244,"originalJapaneseLine":"水を差すように、メディウサの放送が始まった。","translatedEnglishLine":"Medusa's broadcast began as if to pour cold water on it."},{"lineNumber":47245,"originalJapaneseLine":"『ああィやあああぁぁぁぁッ！！","translatedEnglishLine":"'Aah noooohhh!!"},{"lineNumber":47246,"originalJapaneseLine":"　たすっ、助け、ふぇぇぶ、ぐぼぇぇっ……！』","translatedEnglishLine":"Help, help me, fehb, guboehh...!'"},{"lineNumber":47247,"originalJapaneseLine":"女性士官が、じわじわと壊されていく。","translatedEnglishLine":"A female officer was being gradually destroyed."},{"lineNumber":47248,"originalJapaneseLine":"毎日流されているにしろ、","translatedEnglishLine":"Even though it was broadcast daily,"},{"lineNumber":47249,"originalJapaneseLine":"その直視に耐えない凄惨さに、司令部も揺れ動く。","translatedEnglishLine":"The command center was shaken by the unbearable brutality of witnessing it directly."},{"lineNumber":47250,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………ちっ。相変わらず、胸糞の悪い……」","translatedEnglishLine":"...Tch. As disgusting as ever..."},{"lineNumber":47251,"originalJapaneseLine":"「緊急の指示が終わったら、","translatedEnglishLine":"Once the emergency orders are finished,"},{"lineNumber":47252,"originalJapaneseLine":"　すぐに討伐の作戦を立てましょ。","translatedEnglishLine":"let's immediately plan a mission to exterminate them."},{"lineNumber":47253,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こっちも動かせるだけの……」","translatedEnglishLine":"We have as many forces as we can mobilize..."},{"lineNumber":47254,"originalJapaneseLine":"『や、やめ、ッ……","translatedEnglishLine":"'S-Stop...!"},{"lineNumber":47255,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ご、ごめんなさい、ッ……ゆる、許し、ッ……！","translatedEnglishLine":"S-Sorry... Please, forgive me...!"},{"lineNumber":47256,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あぐぇッ……ぎゃああああぁぁぁッ！！』","translatedEnglishLine":"Ugh... Gyaaaahhh!!'"},{"lineNumber":47257,"originalJapaneseLine":"どうにか背筋を張るマジックに","translatedEnglishLine":"Just as they tried to steel their resolve,"},{"lineNumber":47258,"originalJapaneseLine":"水を差すように、女性士官の断末魔が響いた。","translatedEnglishLine":"the female officer's dying scream echoed, spoiling the mood."},{"lineNumber":47259,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はーぁぁあ……壊れちゃっ、た♪」","translatedEnglishLine":"Haaaah... she's broken now♪"},{"lineNumber":47260,"originalJapaneseLine":"ぽいっと、蛇が貫いていた女体を放り捨てる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Carelessly, the snake discarded the female body it had pierced."},{"lineNumber":47261,"originalJapaneseLine":"「アレフガルドー」","translatedEnglishLine":"Alefgard—"},{"lineNumber":47262,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はいお嬢様。","translatedEnglishLine":"Yes, milady."},{"lineNumber":47263,"originalJapaneseLine":"　サンドウィッチでよろしゅうございますか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Would you like a sandwich?"},{"lineNumber":47264,"originalJapaneseLine":"「んー」","translatedEnglishLine":"Mmm."},{"lineNumber":47265,"originalJapaneseLine":"ひょいひょいと、メディウサの手が","translatedEnglishLine":"Medusa’s hands nimbly"},{"lineNumber":47266,"originalJapaneseLine":"サンドウィッチを摘んで口の中へ放り込んでいく。","translatedEnglishLine":"picked up a sandwich and tossed it into her mouth."},{"lineNumber":47267,"originalJapaneseLine":"「むぐもぐ……はー。ダメだわ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Munch munch... Haa. This won't do."},{"lineNumber":47268,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ、お嬢様、食べながら喋るとこぼしますぞ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, milady, if you talk while eating, you'll spill it."},{"lineNumber":47269,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ふきふき……」","translatedEnglishLine":"*Wipe wipe...*"},{"lineNumber":47270,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん」","translatedEnglishLine":"Mm."},{"lineNumber":47271,"originalJapaneseLine":"「これでよろしゅうございます。","translatedEnglishLine":"Will this be all right?"},{"lineNumber":47272,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それで、どうなさいましたか」","translatedEnglishLine":"So, what would you like to do?"},{"lineNumber":47273,"originalJapaneseLine":"「人間、脆すぎ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Humans are too fragile."},{"lineNumber":47274,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こっちが盛り上がってきた頃には、","translatedEnglishLine":"By the time I'm getting excited,"},{"lineNumber":47275,"originalJapaneseLine":"　もう勝手に壊れちゃうんだもん」","translatedEnglishLine":"they've already broken on their own."},{"lineNumber":47276,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ちょろーっと臓物引き出したら、","translatedEnglishLine":"Once I pull out some organs,"},{"lineNumber":47277,"originalJapaneseLine":"　もう反応もしなくなっちゃうしさー。つまんない」","translatedEnglishLine":"they stop reacting. It's boring."},{"lineNumber":47278,"originalJapaneseLine":"「もう少し丁寧に使って頂きたいですがなあ……","translatedEnglishLine":"I'd appreciate it if you'd use them a bit more carefully..."},{"lineNumber":47279,"originalJapaneseLine":"　次はどういたしますか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"What shall we do next?"},{"lineNumber":47280,"originalJapaneseLine":"「んー…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm..."},{"lineNumber":47281,"originalJapaneseLine":"メディウサは、爪を口元に当てて、","translatedEnglishLine":"Medusa touched her nail to her lips,"},{"lineNumber":47282,"originalJapaneseLine":"少しだけ思案した。","translatedEnglishLine":"and pondered for a moment."},{"lineNumber":47283,"originalJapaneseLine":"『――金髪。グラマーなのがいいな。","translatedEnglishLine":"'—Blonde. I want a glamorous one."},{"lineNumber":47284,"originalJapaneseLine":"　簡単に壊れないコ、探してきて』","translatedEnglishLine":"Find me someone who won't break easily.'"},{"lineNumber":47285,"originalJapaneseLine":"『かしこまりました』","translatedEnglishLine":"'Understood.'"},{"lineNumber":47286,"originalJapaneseLine":"そして、通信が切れる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Then, the communication ended."},{"lineNumber":47287,"originalJapaneseLine":"「っ、また……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, again..."},{"lineNumber":47288,"originalJapaneseLine":"「――――――――リズナだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"It's Rizana."},{"lineNumber":47289,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えっ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Huh?"},{"lineNumber":47290,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おい、リズナは今、どこにいる！","translatedEnglishLine":"Hey, where is Rizana now!"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あんなに威勢良く啖呵を切ったんだから」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You were so spiritedly defiant just now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おお、任せろ。
あんな外道、俺様が叩っ斬ってくれるわ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll slash down such a villain myself!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うひょひょ、そうそう。
ずばーっと残虐返しで寸刻みじゃい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll swiftly and cruelly cut him to pieces.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おお……メディウサを倒せる……のか」
「それなら、まだ、光明は……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If that's so, then there is still hope…

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜ぴんぽんぱんぽーん＞
『はーぁーーい。ちょっと待たせちゃったかしら。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Heeey. Did I keep you waiting a bit?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今日もお姉さんのヒミツの時間、始まりよー』
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Today's big sister's secret time is starting again~'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほのかに前向きになろうとした空気に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Amid an atmosphere that was starting to turn faintly hopeful,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 水を差すように、メディウサの放送が始まった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Medusa's broadcast began as if to pour cold water on it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 『ああィやあああぁぁぁぁッ！！
たすっ、助け、ふぇぇぶ、ぐぼぇぇっ……！』
女性士官が、じわじわと壊されていく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A female officer was being gradually destroyed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 毎日流されているにしろ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even though it was broadcast daily,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その直視に耐えない凄惨さに、司令部も揺れ動く。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The command center was shaken by the unbearable brutality of witnessing it directly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………ちっ。相変わらず、胸糞の悪い……」
「緊急の指示が終わったら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Once the emergency orders are finished,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すぐに討伐の作戦を立てましょ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: let's immediately plan a mission to exterminate them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こっちも動かせるだけの……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We have as many forces as we can mobilize...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 『や、やめ、ッ……
ご、ごめんなさい、ッ……ゆる、許し、ッ……！
あぐぇッ……ぎゃああああぁぁぁッ！！』
どうにか背筋を張るマジックに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just as they tried to steel their resolve,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 水を差すように、女性士官の断末魔が響いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the female officer's dying scream echoed, spoiling the mood.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はーぁぁあ……壊れちゃっ、た♪」
ぽいっと、蛇が貫いていた女体を放り捨てる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Carelessly, the snake discarded the female body it had pierced.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「アレフガルドー」
「はいお嬢様。
サンドウィッチでよろしゅうございますか？」
「んー」
ひょいひょいと、メディウサの手が
サンドウィッチを摘んで口の中へ放り込んでいく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: picked up a sandwich and tossed it into her mouth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「むぐもぐ……はー。ダメだわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Munch munch... Haa. This won't do.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、お嬢様、食べながら喋るとこぼしますぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, milady, if you talk while eating, you'll spill it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふきふき……」
「これでよろしゅうございます。
それで、どうなさいましたか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, what would you like to do?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「人間、脆すぎ。
こっちが盛り上がってきた頃には、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By the time I'm getting excited,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう勝手に壊れちゃうんだもん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: they've already broken on their own.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちょろーっと臓物引き出したら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Once I pull out some organs,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう反応もしなくなっちゃうしさー。つまんない」
「もう少し丁寧に使って頂きたいですがなあ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'd appreciate it if you'd use them a bit more carefully...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 次はどういたしますか？」
メディウサは、爪を口元に当てて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Medusa touched her nail to her lips,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少しだけ思案した。
『――金髪。グラマーなのがいいな。
簡単に壊れないコ、探してきて』
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Find me someone who won't break easily.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 『かしこまりました』
そして、通信が切れる。
「えっ？」
「おい、リズナは今、どこにいる！

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「むぐもぐ……はー。ダメだわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Munch munch... Haa. This won't do.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、お嬢様、食べながら喋るとこぼしますぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, milady, if you talk while eating, you'll spill it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふきふき……」
「これでよろしゅうございます。
それで、どうなさいましたか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, what would you like to do?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「人間、脆すぎ。
こっちが盛り上がってきた頃には、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By the time I'm getting excited,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう勝手に壊れちゃうんだもん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: they've already broken on their own.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちょろーっと臓物引き出したら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Once I pull out some organs,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう反応もしなくなっちゃうしさー。つまんない」
「もう少し丁寧に使って頂きたいですがなあ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'd appreciate it if you'd use them a bit more carefully...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 次はどういたしますか？」
メディウサは、爪を口元に当てて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Medusa touched her nail to her lips,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少しだけ思案した。
『――金髪。グラマーなのがいいな。
簡単に壊れないコ、探してきて』
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Find me someone who won't break easily.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 『かしこまりました』
そして、通信が切れる。
「えっ？」
「おい、リズナは今、どこにいる！
